Name: Yuli Constanza
description:
Yuli Constanza is a young poultry and guinea pig farmer from Pitalito, Huila. Despite her young age, Yuli has been raising animals for more than 12 years, specializing in diverse local species. She is currently looking to expand her business by purchasing 2 pigs which she will progressively grow for the next year.

Yuli lives with her husband in a house they built over the course of 5 years. In the picture, Yuli appears with her nephew who also wants to become a poultry farmer and is learning the main traditions regarding the business.

A loan of 1.312.823 COP helps Yuli to purchase organic food made in the region that will strengthen her poultry production.
